snippet.title: Quick Tip: Get the most out of your photos with Google Auto Awesome
snippet.description: Handy Google Auto Awesome features help you customize your photos on the fly.

snippet.title: The Hobbit trilogy effect: More kids' books that should be made into three movies
snippet.description: Ken Hardin offers a tongue-and-cheek look at three classic children's books that Peter Jackson or a like-minded filmmaker could make into three movies.

snippet.title: Opened the bOX
snippet.description: Well I am over the moon with it. I can even watch my Youtube movies on it and receive E-mail. But I cant send it on the wi-fi cause I have an old fashioned Hotmail account. Too bad...

snippet.title: Online anonymity: Balancing the needs to protect privacy and prevent cybercrime
snippet.description: Online anonymity: Balancing the needs to protect privacy and prevent cybercrime

snippet.title: Geek Trivia: How many parents did Dolly the cloned sheep actually have?
snippet.description: Most modern versions of sci-fi clones don't have just one parent -- they have several -- and this goes for the world's most famous cloned mammal: Dolly the sheep.

snippet.title: US taps IT and consumers to solve the 21st century energy challenge
snippet.description: The U.S. is attacking the problem of its outdated power grid with new vigor. Here is my summary of the Obama administration's plans and the initiative's two biggest obstacles.

snippet.title: Geek Gifts 2010: Personal Soundtrack Shirt
snippet.description: The Personal Soundtrack Shirt, which was originally an April Fool's joke, comes with 20 pre-programmed sounds - but you can also load your own MP3 files and discreetly play them (a...

snippet.title: Know your science-fiction subgenres
snippet.description: Alien invasion, hard science, space opera, and time travel are just some of the subgenres of science-fiction books and movies. What is your favorite sci-fi subgenre?

snippet.title: IT gender gap: Where are the female programmers?
snippet.description: Justin James presents data points and theories about why more women aren't getting into and staying in development roles, particularly in Western cultures.

snippet.title: Peer seeks science-fiction movie recommendations
snippet.description: TechRepublic member jardinier is looking for science-fiction movie recommendations. Check out some of the film suggestions he's already received and then add your picks to the list...
